description:
A ruthless army stands ready for war, but the one man who can stop it has been captured. As Rad Spencer, the Bionic Commando, use your high-tech grapple hook and assault rifle to infiltrate the enemy’s stronghold in a daring mission to rescue Super Joe.

This Game Boy™ version of the NES™ classic brings you all the platform-swinging, gun-toting action of the original plus a brand new graphical style. Reunite with your ally, take out the evil Director Wiseman, and bring peace to the world.
name: BIONIC COMMANDO™
